text: Ved Prakash Marwah (15 September 1934 â€“ 5 June 2020) was an Indian politician. He was Governor of Manipur from 1999 to 2003,Territorial integrity adorns Marwah's Assembly address : 12 March 2003 E-Pao! Headlines Mizoram from 2000 to 2001 and Jharkhand from 2003 to 2004. He was born in Peshawar, British India. Marwah died on 5 June 2020 from lung disease-related problems at a hospital in Goa, India at the age of 85.Ved Marwah, former chief of Delhi Police, passes away in Goa ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:Governors of Bihar Category:Governors of Jharkhand Category:Governors of Manipur Category:Governors of Mizoram
title: Ved Marwah
